## Checklist

- [ ] Front matter is complete (title, tldr, categories, date, translationKey)
- [ ] If PDF included, accessible .md text version is also included
- [ ] TL;DR summary accurately describes the document
- [ ] Content is factually accurate to the best of my knowledge
- [ ] For translations: translationKey matches the original document
